products.title: Ultra Slim Laptop Pro
products.description: Powerful 15-inch laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and a stunning 4K display. Perfect for professionals and content creators.

products.title: Artisan Coffee Maker
products.description: Premium coffee maker with temperature control, built-in grinder, and programmable settings for the perfect brew every morning.

products.title: SmartLife Fitness Watch
products.description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, GPS, sleep analysis, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant up to 50m.

products.title: Premium Wireless Headphones
products.description: Noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life, immersive sound quality, and ultra-comfortable ear cushions.

products.title: Modern Desk Lamp
products.description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with 5 brightness levels, touch controls, and USB charging port. Energy-efficient and sleek design.

products.title: High-Power Blender
products.description: Professional-grade blender with 1200W motor, 6 preset programs, and dishwasher-safe components. Perfect for smoothies, soups, and more.

products.title: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360Â° sound, 20-hour battery life, and built-in microphone for calls. Perfect for outdoor adventures.

products.title: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.description: Fully adjustable office chair with lumbar support, breathable mesh back, and premium cushioning for all-day comfort.

products.title: Deluxe Gas Grill
products.description: Four-burner gas grill with side burner, electronic ignition, and temperature gauge. Includes warming rack and tool hooks.

products.title: Professional Hair Dryer
products.description: Lightweight ionic hair dryer with 3 heat settings, 2 speed settings, and cool shot button. Reduces frizz and drying time.

products.title: Ultra-Thin Tablet
products.description: 10.5-inch high-resolution tablet with 128GB storage, 12-hour battery life, and powerful octa-core processor. Perfect for work and entertainment.

products.title: 4-Slice Toaster
products.description: Stainless steel 4-slice toaster with 7 browning settings, defrost function, and extra-wide slots for bagels and artisan bread.

products.title: Mountain Bike
products.description: All-terrain mountain bike with 21-speed drivetrain, front suspension, and disc brakes. Durable aluminum frame and cushioned seat.

products.title: Electric Lawn Mower
products.description: Cordless electric lawn mower with 40V lithium battery, 19-inch cutting deck, and 3-in-1 functionality: mulching, bagging, and side discharge.

products.title: Ceramic Curling Iron
products.description: Professional 1-inch ceramic curling iron with adjustable temperature settings, automatic shut-off, and heat-resistant glove included.

products.title: Luxury Pet Bed
products.description: Orthopedic memory foam pet bed with waterproof lining, removable/washable cover, and non-slip bottom. Available in multiple sizes.

products.title: Camera Drone
products.description: Foldable drone with 4K camera, 30-minute flight time, GPS positioning, and follow-me mode. Includes remote controller and extra batteries.

products.title: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
products.description: Smart robot vacuum with mapping technology, voice control compatibility, and self-emptying dustbin. Runs up to 120 minutes on a single charge.

products.title: Smart Body Scale
products.description: Digital bathroom scale that measures weight, BMI, body fat percentage, and more. Syncs with smartphone app to track progress over time.

products.title: Digital Air Fryer
products.description: 6-quart digital air fryer with 8 preset cooking functions, easy-clean basket, and rapid air technology for healthier fried foods with 75% less fat.
